name: Garroter Crab
description: The Garroter Crab is a tiny, vicious creature with a strong physique characterized by its whip-like claws. Its small size and unique abilities make it an effective ambusher.
memorable: Its ability to deliver a mental vision to humanoids it grapples and defeats adds a unique twist to its predatory nature.
goals: To ambush and grapple prey, reducing them to 0 hit points.
relations: Can be found in aquatic environments, potentially alongside other amphibious creatures.
environment: Commonly found near water bodies, both fresh and saltwater.
strengths: Strong physical capabilities that enhance its grappling ability, making it a difficult opponent in close quarters.
weaknesses: Lacks durability and mental capabilities, making it vulnerable outside of its ambush tactics.
attacks: Uses its whip-like claws to deal slashing damage and grapple targets.
most_powerful_ability: Strangling Divination allows it to provide a mental vision of the future to its grappled prey.
senses: Possesses darkvision, enabling it to see in dim light up to 60 feet.
skills: Excels in athletics with a modifier of +4 due to its strong physique.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water due to its amphibious nature.
Grappled targets cannot speak or cast spells with verbal components.
Has a reach of 10 feet with its attacks, allowing it to engage targets from a distance.
Once a target receives a vision, they must wait 30 days for another.
Its small size makes it easy to overlook until it strikes.
test_queries: tiny vicious crab that grapples prey
amphibious creature with mental vision attack
strong crab lurking in water for ambush
crustacean that silences spellcasters when grappling
